Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Christopher Luxon leads a coalition Government that appears to be turning away from bipartisan approaches to the application of the Treaty of Waitangi. Photo / RNZ

Auckland Anniversary floods: Father of victim Daniel Miller finds comfort in diary https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-anniversary-floods-father-of-victim-daniel-miller-finds-comfort-in-diary/NPKSO2SGZBF5BBCTR6MPGNJKX4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-anniversary-floods-father-of-victim-daniel-miller-finds-comfort-in-diary/NPKSO2SGZBF5BBCTR6MPGNJKX4/ Cherie HowieHis son just wanted to help, but Steve Miller is urging others to "leave it to the pros". Fri, 26 Jan 2024 17:06:02 +0000 Father-of-two Daniel Miller died while trying to help others during last year's Auckland floods. His family say he accidentally stepped into a floodwater-concealed drain after a manhole lid came off.
